page.title: 15A CHILD'S DAY IN PLYMTREE
page.content: I usually get up for school at 7am and get changed into my school uniform & go downstairs. Our house is a reason- able size with 4 bedrooms. It is also a farm with 130 acres. When I have finished playing my music which is the guitar and piano I have some cereal for breakfast. When it is 9am I am driven to school in the car. It is about 1 mile to school and so some- times I cycle. Most mornings at school we have English, Mental Maths, Play- time, Assembly, more Maths & Reading. In the afternoon we have activities like Swimming, Art, Project Work, etc. After school I sometimes play with my friends. Also during the week I have been going to quite a few activities such as Music, Swimming, Cubs, and Gymnastics. I usually go to bed at 8.30pm and read until 9pm.
